A little MRA trouble...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): A little MRA trouble...
By Gizmo the Lemur on Sunday, September 15, 2002 - 10:43 pm:

Ok, I managed to beat the big four S-class battles with the very first diva I raised a long time ago, and I got the information about the fight with Dynast after winning that S-class tourney in December a few months ago. However, I am not getting the invitation for the last fight around June. I tried using another monster, but I still could not get the invite even if I beat the Winners' Cup with the other three. Can someone show me what I did wrong? I beat the other tourneys when I beat the WInner's Cup, and I still didn't get the invite.

I am one rank away from getting the best rank. I hope I don't have to restart the game again b/c I made a really good [3rd gen] Joker (Not as good as a maxed out 6th gen Joker with all the moves, and the best traits, but it was getting there).

I can use some help, and I would appreciate it if I someone can help me answer this question.

By Wesley B on Saturday, July 5, 2003 - 10:08 pm:

Sorry, I'm kinda new to MRA even though it's old. I'm pretty new to all MR games although I've had them all for a long time. What's 1st gen and 2nd gen etc.? Please respond.

By John Hawley on Sunday, July 6, 2003 - 04:01 am:

1st gen - monster created at the shrine.

2nd gen - monster created by combining two 1st gen monsters.

3rd gen - monster created by combining two 2nd gen monsters.

The advantages to 2nd and 3rd gen monsters are better stats, more techs and more or better traits at the beginning of their lives. Thus, less lifespan loss in training and more time for raising.

P.S. It's always better to start a new thread for a question that diverges from the question asked in the current thread, especially when the post is as old as this one.
